description:
The Tokeland Fleece Jacket is a versatile piece designed as a standalone jacket or layering for cool weather activity. Recycled polyester is quick-drying, wicking, and breathable, making this jacket ideal for any outdoor activity. UPF 30 provides sun protection, and the trim offers a contrasting woven fabric that adds an extra touch of durability and style.

The Men's Tokeland Fleece Vest is the perfect layer for chilly days spent exploring new hiking trails.
name: Outdoor Research Tokeland Fleece Jacket - Mens
